name: man-sign-1
description: - Cloned from Arturo - Added `Dockerfile`, which exposes frontend to port 8080

scripts.e2e-test: dotnet build ./e2e_playwrighttests/playwight.sln && pwsh ./e2e_playwrighttests/PlaywrightTests/bin/Debug/net9.0/playwright.ps1 install --with-deps && dotnet test ./e2e_playwrighttests/playwright.sln --filter TestCategory=E2ETest
